name: quicktask
description: Automatic task execution for Gulp, NPM, Shell and more from the comfort of VS Code.

quicktask.excludesGlob.description: The glob which Quick Task will exclude from scans.

quicktask.gulpGlob.description: The glob which Quick Task will scan for gulp tasks.

quicktask.npmGlob.description: The glob which Quick Task will scan for npm tasks.

quicktask.enableGulp.description: Enables the scanning of Gulp tasks.

quicktask.enableNpm.description: Enables the scanning of NPM tasks.

quicktask.enableShell.description: Enables the scanning of Shell scripts.

quicktask.enablePython.description: Enables the scanning of Python scripts.

quicktask.enableRuby.description: Enables the scanning of Ruby scripts.

quicktask.enablePerl.description: Enables the scanning of Perl scripts.

quicktask.enablePowershell.description: Enables the scanning of Powershell scripts.
